attributes.action: change the rules so that the control and administration of MPs expenses is moved out of the area of responsibility of the Speaker of the House of Commons and given over to an independent panel of 6 randomly selected basic rate taxpayers who can serve only 12 months on the committee.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The current Speaker has repeatedly demonstrated that politicians have a basic inability to put themselves above their own and their colleagues' interests when it comes to management of public money used to cover MPs expenses.  The only way to control this sort of expenditure is for those who are paying for it to be involved in how it is spent.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
